results.name: Warriors of the Nile Series Bundle

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel I7 2.9Ghz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Super
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR: 1) Official support for Oculus Touch (Oculus Rift, Oculus RiftS, OculusQuest - Linked, MetaQuest2 - Linked, MetaQuestPro - Linked). 2) Reported to work but not verified or officially supported for Valve Index and potentially other SteamVR compatible headsets.
  • Additional Notes: There are multiple graphics settings (low for recommended min. settings), also in early access some areas might require higher system requirements to maintain desired FPS. SteamVR: Oculus Touch (Oculus Rift, Oculus RiftS, OculusQuest - Linked, MetaQuest2 - Linked, MetaQuestPro - Linked). Reported to work but not verified or officially supported for Valve Index.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: Further testing needed to verify recommended settings for "high" graphics.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 - AMD Athlon II X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 - Nvidia GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 - AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 - AMD R7 250X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 7
  • Processor: Any Dual-core 2.4 GHz
  • Graphics: 256MB VRAM

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NIVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 9700
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NIVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and up
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1.3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This app features keyboard controls and partial controller support with the Xbox controller. Mouse/touch screen are not supported.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
